page.title: 12FAVOURITE FOOD
page.content: BREAKFAST Cereals especially cornflakes taost with jam or marmalade.Favourite drinks are tea, coffee and orange juice. LUNCH If the children did not stay to school dinners most of them had protein or salad filled sandwiches. EVENING MEAL Those children who stayed for a cooked school dinner had sandwiches in the evening and others who had sandwiches at lunchtime had a cooked meal in the evening. SATURDAY 50%had one cooked meal during the day the others having snacks followed by sweet dessert.60% of children preffered fizzy drinks. SUNDAY Most children had a roast meal either midday or in the evening.
